section.title: Samples of how to integrate various applications with the Wrapper
section.para: This section is designed to help you get up and running quickly by showing you how to setup some popular applications to run using the Wrapper.

If you do not see the application you would like to use in the list below, then others may be looking as well. We do not have time to write examples for every application ourselves. But we would be happy to make what you come up with available for other users.
